subtitle: Serve this quick and delicious recipe with sauteed potatoes and lightly cooked apple rings.

method.text: Heat the oil and butter in a large frying pan. Add the pork. Cook until browned for about 15 min or until just tender.
Meanwhile, make the sauce: Melt the butter in a pan. Add the garlic and saute for 1-2 min. Add the tarragon, mustard, lemon juice and brandy. Bring to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 2-3 min.
Gradually stir in the cream and adjust seasoning, without boiling. Add the cooked pork and serve.

title: Pork in creamy tarragon sauce
